title: Return on equity of BNP Paribas 2003 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Return on equity, with a total of 16 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2013.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2011 to 2008.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2006 to 2003.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2018 to 2016.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2013 to 2011.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2008 to 2006.
gold: The statistic shows the return on equity of BNP Paribas from 2003 to 2018 . In 2018 , the return on equity of the global banking group headquartered in Paris was equal to 8.2 percent .
